prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Pipe, Organ, Drums, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:

This piece of music features Drums, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Organ, and Synth Pad, but no Brass.

Style 2:

This song is composed of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Organ, and Synth Pad, omitting Brass.

Style 3:

This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Organ, and Synth Pad, excluding Brass.
